author: cms-AlCaDB
body:
@silviodonato @fabozzi
retrying here PR #16384, taking @makortel's https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/16384#issuecomment-256996737, which unfortunately is not enough.
Namely CMSSW_8_1_X_2016-10-28-1100 +https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/commit/32d46dc06c200233eea89b911434c03dffc70b46 + https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/commit/505028c0ee905da1a3e03c1a21614e4ede8cec86
still results in 

```
cmsRun: /build/cmsbuild/jenkins-workarea/workspace/build-any-ib/w/tmp/BUILDROOT/5807ca27a61cace36698b4e41c6310d3/opt/cmssw/slc6_amd64_gcc530/cms/cmssw-patch/CMSSW_8_1_X_2016-
10-28-1100/src/Geometry/HcalTowerAlgo/src/HcalGeometry.cc:127: virtual DetId HcalGeometry::getClosestCell(const GlobalPoint&) const: Assertion `bestId != HcalDetId()' failed.

```

removing HcalCalHBHEMuonFilter from the sequence (i.e. https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/commit/35e0543597dade2d7f88e4785f0418ee7d5e18cb) seems to work in local tests. @bsunanda can you have a look?
title: using HLT:@relval2016 for phase1 relvals (retry)
